subject: Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: “I had the perfect day,” said the gold medal winner, Sandro Viletta of Switzerland, as Bode Miller and Ted Ligety of the United States finished sixth and 12th in the men’s super combined.
snippet: “I had the perfect day,” said the gold medal winner, Sandro Viletta of Switzerland, as Bode Miller and Ted Ligety of the United States finished sixth and 12th in the men’s super combined.
